attributes.descriptionLocal: Press LShift + H to engage emergency exit
Holds the dynamic zoom as long as the button is held
Switches the mouse behavior for ship rotations between a relative (FPS style) and a Vjoy mode.
Inverts Strafe Longitudinal Absolute Axis Half (Neutral - Backward)
Toggles Speed Limiter on and off
Resets Speed Limiter to full SCM.
Acceleration Limiter Up / Down (rel.) - Decreases / increases acceleration limiter relative to old value
Acceleration Limiter Up / Down (abs.) - Decreases / increases acceleration limiter.
While active no rotational inputs are allowed to your ship. This is useful for arresting movement when you lost control using a mouse.
Toggles Cruise Control mode on and off
Cycle between the vehicle's expanded and retracted configurations.
Contacts ATC and other landing services.

attributes.descriptionLocal: Enables and disables Look Ahead Mode
Allows you to track a locked target with your head

attributes.labelLocal: Auto Zoom On Selected Target On / Off (Toggle, Hold)
attributes.descriptionLocal: Allows you to enable and disable auto zoom on selected targets.

Cycle Lock - Hostiles - Reset to Closest

attributes.descriptionLocal: Increase the angle of the Scanning Cone
Decrease the angle of the Scanning Cone

Decreases the target distance for an object controlled with the Vehicle Tractor Beam.

Toggle firing the Left salvage tool
Toggle firing the Right salvage tool
Toggle between gimbled and fixed salvage targeting modes.
Increase the spacing between the Vulture's two salvage heads.
Decrease the spacing between the Vulture's two salvage heads.
Adjust the relative spacing between the Vulture's two salvage heads.
Adjust the absolute spacing between the Vulture's two salvage heads.
Set the orientation axis of the salvage beam to vertical or horizontal.
Cycle through available modifiers on the Focused salvage head(s)
Cycle through available modifiers on the left salvage head or salvage turret.
Cycle through available modifiers on the right salvage head or salvage turret.
Cycle through available modes on the Structural Salvage tool.

attributes.labelLocal: Toggle Turret Mouse Movement (VJoy, FPS style)
attributes.descriptionLocal: Enables / Disables relative mouse mode for turrets
Toggles the limiter for the rotational turret speed
Increases the speed of the turret.
Decreases the speed of the turret.

attributes.labelLocal: Manual Gimbal Mode - Swap VJoy / Look Direction (Toggle, Hold)
attributes.descriptionLocal: This will cause the aim reticle to either follow the VJoy indication on the HUD or your look direction.

attributes.labelLocal: Manual Gimbal Mode - Lock Aim Vector
attributes.descriptionLocal: Locks the aim vector in manual gimbal mode.

attributes.labelLocal: Cycle Gimbal Assist / Standard Gimbal / Gimbal Lock modes

attributes.descriptionLocal: Cycle through staggered and combined fire modes.

PIP Combination Type: Set Average Of All

attributes.descriptionLocal: Sets the manual convergence distance on a relative axis
Resets the Manual Convergence Distance to the default value
Increases range by one step in the bomb alignment HUD
Resets to the default range in the bomb alignment HUD

attributes.descriptionLocal: Increases the burst size by one.
Decreases the burst size by one.
Launches a large percentage of the countermeasure magazine.
Cycles the pitch ladder mode between off, HUD, look direction and mixed.
